subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
Weather
lead_paragraph: The men’s and women’s fourth-round singles matches are now scheduled for Wednesday, with Andy Roddick set to play on a court other than Ashe at the Open for the first time in eight years.
snippet: The men’s and women’s fourth-round singles matches are now scheduled for Wednesday, with Andy Roddick set to play on a court other than Ashe at the Open for the first time in eight years.
